channel.title: Run.bat looks bad for me
channel.description: Here is what it looks like: [code] Server is online! null Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.destruct(client.java:9831) at client.run(client.java:20178) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) null Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.destruct(client.java:9831) at client.run(client.java:20178) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (88.333.221.90) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (88.333.221.90) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (88.333.221.90) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (88.333.221.90) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (88.333.221.90) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (70.301.251.99) [/code]

item.title: Run.bat looks bad for me
item.dc:creator: @burnt_w_pwnt burnt w pwnt
item.description:
@burnt_w_pwnt wrote:

[quote=“Hextion, post:9, topic:291221”][quote author=burnt w pwnt link=topic=384912.msg2887478#msg2887478 date=1248704405]
im using delta btw
[/quote]
^ Explains it all.

Thread per client doesn’t work with any deltascape based source in less you have modified it to a specific standards, I’m sure on the thread per client tutorial it tells you not to try this with a deltascape server.

If you are going to use a server try something a bit more advanced, maybe Yz’s server, even though there are a few minor errors.[/quote]
Oh thanks, i didnt know that, but is their anyway of stopping lagg & Dc’s then?
You know, like If some1 logs in (the log in a client) that client causes lagg
then the server gets laggy… how can i fix that lol?

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat looks bad for me
item.dc:creator: @Hextion Hextion
item.description:
@Hextion wrote:

burnt w pwnt:

im using delta btw

^ Explains it all.

Thread per client doesn’t work with any deltascape based source in less you have modified it to a specific standards, I’m sure on the thread per client tutorial it tells you not to try this with a deltascape server.

If you are going to use a server try something a bit more advanced, maybe Yz’s server, even though there are a few minor errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat looks bad for me
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

burnt w pwnt:

Well, yeah cuz last time i put Thread per client in, but it failed came up wid errors so i removed it and its still going like this.

Then you have removed something important in your void run method, if you don’t have a backup your fucked - (Start from scratch)
